title: Boku to Gaku: Ano Natsu no Monogatari
original_name: ボクとガク ～あの夏のものがたり～
sinopse: An educational film about losing hope in children in Japan. In the movie's example, how it is bad it is to say another child "doesn't stand a chance" or "don't think too much of them, they won't amount to anything" because of their upbringing or background or single action they did.
